  • 2 · 2025-10-29 · properly-fucked
    Labour is introducing a Pay Transparency Bill, mandating large employers (150+ staff) to publicly report gender and ethnic pay gaps and include pay ranges in job advertisements. The stated aim is to close workplace inequalities and accelerate progress towards equal pay.
  • Labour seeks to force large employers to report gender, ethnic pay gaps · 2025-10-29 · properly-fucked
    Labour plans a new bill requiring large employers (150+ staff) to publicly report gender and ethnic pay gaps and include pay ranges in job ads, aiming to accelerate workplace equality.
  • Pensioner’s dinner shock: Pams butter turns black with mould · 2025-10-29 · properly-fucked
    A Hastings pensioner discovered her recently purchased Pams butter was blackened with mould, despite a distant best-before date, raising concerns about product quality and prompting a wary approach to future purchases.
  • Auckland suburb loses Domino's Pizza · 2025-10-29 · properly-fucked
    Red Beach's Domino's Pizza has closed due to insufficient sales, leaving Inland Revenue and potentially other creditors unlikely to recover owed funds.
